testcase.name: Search for a Puma Shoe brand new and show result
testcase.system-out: Given user is in Ebay home page.............................................passed When he first clicks in the top centered searchbox..........................passed And he is able to write the word shoes......................................passed Then he press the key Enter another page is loaded..........................passed But user should not see the homepage........................................passed When Select status “New with box”...........................................passed Then he should see the page refresh and show results........................passed And he selects the brand "puma".............................................passed When Print the number of results in console.................................passed
